name: Project Kindle
description:
A platformer-shooter where you take control of Kindle to help her defeat the evil monsters of The Onyx. It’s up to you to stop the mastermind Coro from sending the Dream World into doom!

Move with the arrow keys. Jump with Z, Shoot with X, Switch weapons with A and S. Collect energy from defeated enemies to level up your weapon.

This game is being developed as a semester project at UMBC by:

  • Isaiah H. (Dreamer13sq) - YouTube, GitHub 
  • David I. - GitHub
  • Camille O.- Portfolio
  • Aidan S. - YouTube
  • Taheer P.
